name: Zemk
description: A stout, hostile duergar with a grim expression and the lingering stench of pickled herring about him. He is stubbornly focused on his task, ignoring all outside council with single-minded intensity.
personality_traits: Responds to most conversation with grunts
ideals: Duty: 'An order is an order. It will be done.'
Perfection: 'It must be done right. My way.'
Strength: 'Weakness is death. Fight or perish.'
bonds: He is fiercely loyal to the Xanathar Guild.
He follows the orders of his superior, Grum'shar, without question, despite the strange circumstances.
flaws: He is incapable of retreating and will fight to the death, even against impossible odds.
He is completely inflexible, unable to adapt his plans.
His paranoia makes him hostile to potential allies.

canned_conversations.on_arrival: *Zemk ignores you, continuing to grunt with effort as he shoves a heavy cabinet against the door.*
canned_conversations.barricade_argument: *To Krentz* 'Gah! My way is better! Be quiet and help!'
canned_conversations.combat_cry: *A guttural roar as he hefts his weapon and charges.*

backstory: Zemk is an enforcer for the Xanathar Guild. He has been tasked with holding this position by Grum'shar. He is currently focused on barricading a door and is annoyed by the presence of the Zhentarim thug, Krentz, whom he views as an incompetent distraction. He will fight any intruders on sight.
motivations: To follow his orders and defend his post to the death.
To prove the superiority of the Xanathar Guild through his own strength.
gm_notes: Zemk is a member of the Xanathar Guild, yet he reports to Grum'shar, a Zhentarim wizard. This is highly unusual and could be a plot hook for the players to investigate. Zemk is relentlessly hostile and will fight to the death without any consideration for surrender or retreat.
